segments.text: I'm observing the woman at the sink, stuck in her simple routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate, probably an everyday chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is perfectly neutral, as if nothing out of the ordinary is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But around her, everything is going wrong in silent motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is steadily flowing over the edge, an unwelcome addition to the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's remarkable how completely isolated she is in her task, despite the growing puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's missing the secret cookie raid happening just behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are in plain sight, but she is utterly unaware of their risky activity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost poignant, this picture of quiet domesticity colliding with unnoticed peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of mild surprise at her profound level of concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a very unusual situation to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only imagine the shock when she finally notices everything.
segments.speaker: PAR
